value.title: Technologists Use Facial Recognition on Parler Videos
value.excerpt: Technologists have used facial recognition techniques on the large archive of Parler videos filmed from the January 6 Capitol riots, Motherboard has learned. In some cases they have been able to track individual faces across different videos,

value.title: Facebook updates its automatic alternative text system with expanded object recognition
value.excerpt: The next-generation AAT system can identify more objects in photos, perceive where each object is located relative to each other and provide more detailed descriptions.

value.title: Understanding machine learning will go a long way toward higher adoption for SMBs
value.excerpt: Expert says larger companies are more willing to spend money for top talent to achieve machine learning, whereas smaller companies aren't able to do so. Pre-configured solutions can help.

value.title: 14 Tech Experts Predict Which Industries And Sectors Will Benefit Most From AI
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence and machine learning have made their way into many diverse industries, changing the way businesses handle everything from inventory to customer relations.

value.title: Redacting PII from application log output with Amazon Comprehend
value.excerpt: Amazon Comprehend is a natural language processing (NLP) service that uses machine learning (ML) to find insights and relationships in text. value.title: New AI system counts endangered elephants from space
value.excerpt: Scientists have combined satellite cameras with a convolutional neural network (CNN) to detect African elephants moving through forests and grasslands.

value.title: Innovate Finance: The UK Retains European Fintech Investment Crown in 2020

value.title: Facebook AI Gets Better at Describing Photos for Visually Impaired Users
value.excerpt: In an effort to better accommodate users who are blind or visually impaired, Facebook this week updated its automatic alternative text (AAT) technology. value.title: Microsoft researchers tap AI for anonymous data sharing for health care providers
value.excerpt: Microsoft and University of British Columbia researchers propose FELICA, a system that leverages AI to let health providers share data.

value.title: Will 2021 Be The Year That AI Finally Scales?

value.title: Nucleus Research Releases Q1 2021 Equity Snapshot for IBM
value.excerpt: Nucleus Research, a global provider of ROI-focused technology research and advisory services, today released its Q1 2021 Equity Snapshot for IBM. The snapshot provides an analysis of IBM’s market growth and performance over the last quarter and a competitive outlook for the months ahead.

value.title: Trump pardons former Google self-driving car engineer Levandowski
value.excerpt: U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he had given a full pardon to a former Google engineer sentenced for stealing a trade secret on self-driving cars months before he briefly headed Uber Technologies Inc's rival unit.

value.title: Why Chicago Is Emerging An AI-Life Sciences Leader
value.excerpt: Chicago is becoming a world leader in a new frontier of precision medicine. And with continued momentum from Chicago-based academic research, venture funded startups and established enterprises—we can expect this sector to continue to expand in the years to come.

value.title: Google investigates ethical AI team member over handling of sensitive data

value.title: Speech Zadarma is offering free access to their widely recommended speech recognition analytics tool until March 2021
value.excerpt: Speech analytics is transforming many aspects of business, and is especially beneficial to any sales driven organisation. Zadarma, most well known as a leading global VoIP provider, also offers an industry leading smart speech recognition and analytics feature as part of their incredibly easy to use and highly affordable telecommunications offering.

value.title: How AI Is Modernizing The Collections Process
value.excerpt: The traditional model's inability to predict which debts will go into collections puts lenders behind the curve. Even worse, when accounts fall behind, this approach applies one-size-fits-all responses that let too many borrowers slip into default.

value.title: Nextech AR Integrates Microsoft Azure Cloud Computing Platform
value.excerpt: Azure, Microsoft’s cloud, and edge computing platform is the gold standard. Nextech AR will enter Microsoft’s Co-sell program, opening additional opportunities to extend the reach of Nextech products and create new customer connections.

value.title: ZIM cooperation network on AI-based agricultural robotics launched: Artificial intelligence for sustainable agriculture
value.excerpt: Zentrum für Agrarlandschaftsforschung (ZALF) e.V. The recently approved ZIM cooperation network "DeepFarmbots" met virtually for its official kick-off on November 25. The central goal of the network is to develop and disseminate new agricultural robotics solutions for efficient and sustainable agriculture.

value.title: Here's Why Investors Should Pay Close Attention to Artificial Intelligence
value.excerpt: Artificial intelligence is ingrained into our lives. It’s influencing our shopping choices online, helping us book meetings, and even finding the best deals. The auto industry is using AI to create driverless cars.

value.title: Beware The AI Death Spiral
value.excerpt: Companies caught in the death spiral have an AI that’s very accurate, but that's also accurately wrong -- and downright dangerous -- for their business.
